detail_description: The Robot X100 is a highly interactive toy robot that can perform various tasks, including walking, talking, and dancing. It comes with a remote control and features LED lights for a captivating experience.
The RoboDog is an adorable robotic pet that can walk, bark, and even perform tricks. It has sensors to detect obstacles and responds to voice commands. Perfect for kids who love dogs!

The AstroBot is an advanced space explorer toy robot. It features a built-in camera for capturing images and videos from its interstellar journeys. It can also communicate with other AstroBots, making it an ideal toy for young space enthusiasts.

The Build-a-Bot is a customizable educational robot kit. Kids can assemble the robot themselves using the provided parts and learn about robotics in a hands-on way. It comes with step-by-step instructions and multiple configurations to keep young minds engaged.
